review: For the Good: I will say the setup was easy.  I followed the simple directions and using my phone it was running in about 5 minutes.For the Bad: while it easily casts netflix and hulu and HBOGo from my phone, it would not cast Hulu from my tablet, the icon in Hulu never appeared despite reloading it twice.  Also I can't cast browser windows from the tablet or my phone.  You can froma laptop, but not your other devices.For the Ugly: it doesn't work at all with a desktop.  The device has to be wireless.  Even though my desktop can see the Chromecast in the networked devices, the chomecast software can't handle communicating with it, so my desktop is right out as a streaming device.At the end of the day, it works great for a laptop, it works kinda from a phone or tablet, and doesn't work at all for a wired desktop.
